msItemStruct.note: Written along the fibers; back blank
Col. I, 39 lines; col. II, 23 lines; almost complete but some damage to top and to bottom left
The hand is a small, fluent cursive

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.

div.ab: [col. I] . . . Harmieis; . . .; . . .; Hathyr . . .; [l. 5] Harmieis, fruit-buyer, 2 art. of wheat; Esouris, fruit-buyer, 2 art. of wheat; Athenotoros Kari-, 2 art. of wheat; Mysthas s. of Balanios in; Phaophi and Hathyr, 4 art. of wheat; [l. 10] Aniketos, 6 art. of wheat; for the bread to Phryn-; so that . . . 2 art of wheat; Horion, for irrigation, 2 art. of wheat; Total 20 art. of wheat; [l. 15] Choiak; Harmieis, fruit-buyer, 2 art. of wheat; Esouris, fruit-buyer, 2 art. of wheat; Athenotoros Kar-, 2 art. of wheat; Mysthas s. of Balanios, 2 art. of wheat; [l. 20] Horion, for irrigation, 2 art. of wheat; Total 10 art. of wheat; Tybi; Harmieis, fruit-buyer, 2 art. of wheat; Esouris, fruit-buyer, 2 art. of wheat; [l. 25] Athenotoros Kari-, 2 art. of wheat; Mysthas s. of Balanios, 2 art. of wheat; Horion, for irrigation, 2 art. of wheat; Total 10 art. of wheat.; Mechir; [l. 30] Harmieis, fruit-buyer, 2 art. of wheat; Esouris, fruit-buyer, 2 art. of wheat; Athenotoros, 2 art. of wheat; Mysthas s. of Balanios, 2 art. of wheat; Total 8 art. of wheat; [l. 35] Phamenoth; Harmieis, fruit-buyer, 2 art. of wheat; Athenotoros Kari-, 2 art. of wheat; Esouris, fruit-buyer; 2 art. of wheat; Mysthas s. of Balanios, 2 art. of wheat; [l. 40] Total 8 art. of wheat. [col. II] Pharmouthi; Harmieis, fruit-buyer, 2 art. of wheat; Esouris, fruit-buyer, 2 art. of wheat; Athenotoros, 2 art. of wheat; [l. 45] Mysthas, s. of Balanios, 2 art. of wheat; to Horion, 1 1/2 1/4 art. of wheat; Total 9 1/2 1/4 art. of wheat; Pachon; for the bread; [l. 50] to Pryn-, 7 art. of wheat; to Horion, 1 1/2 1/4 art. of wheat; Total 8 1/2 1/4 of wheat; from the deposit which [l. 55] Heras gave to me by . . . measurement . . . Total 24 1/2 art. of wheat by the 1/10 measurement for commercial tax equally [l. 60] . . . 94 1/2 1/4 art. of wheat in bronze measured by the administrators.

listBibl.bibl: P.Princ. II 54 P. J. Sijpesteijn, "Corrections on Some Princeton Papyri," ZPE 68 (1987): 143-148. BL IX, 219-220
